name: Super Smash Bros. 2
overview: Super Smash Bros. 2 is a mod of Project M which is a mod of Super Smash Bros. Brawl in order to make the game play and look like Super Smash Bros. Melee. Majority of the characters from the original are back plus others from Brawl and Project M like Sonic, Wolf, King Dedede, and Roy. All the characters have their artwork from Melee now in HD, while new characters get Melee-like artwork. All the models are redone to look like Melee, but in HD.
